Html:
I have another map control on the background, but it has no feature to add overlays,

Gmap.net has easy to use overlays, which I want to use on the top of other map control.

What is the easiest way to make empty transparent map for Gmap control ??

is there any branch or option in source code?
whats the point, how you imagine synchronizing position and scale ;}

thanks for reply :)

the point the underlying map control has no Drawing capabilities, so

I am gonna use gmapnet draw on trajectories on the top of it

the synchronizing position and scale is possible, as far as I can get the longitude latitude values

from both controls at the same point, and I am using it as reference for the scale,,
